shred.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a small thin piece that is torn or cut roughly from something
shred.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: The clothes were ripped to shreds and covered in blood.
shred.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to cut or tear something into small thin pieces
shred.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: Coleslaw is made with shredded cabbage.
shred.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: to put a document into a shredder
shred.translation[1].definitions[1].exam: Carlson was collecting messages, reading them, then shredding them.
shred.translation[2].definitions[0].defi: to cut documents into small pieces so that no one can read them
shred.translation[2].definitions[0].exam: Investigators retrieved documents that had been thrown away or shredded.
